verses.roman:
dviguṇa kariyā kara saba upahāra
ratha-yātrā haite yaiche haya camatkāra

synonyms: dvi-guṇa kariyā—making a double portion; kara—make; saba—all kinds of; upahāra—presentations; ratha-yātrā haite—than the car festival; yaiche—so that; haya—it becomes; camatkāra—more wonderful.
translation: "You should also double the quantity of prasāda. Make so much that it will even surpass the Ratha-yātrā festival.
